name: Mr. President
strat: ($randplayer) is the president. They will get rid of all their weapons/abilities and buy armor. The president has to carry the spike. The rest of the team has to protect them at all costs while yelling secret service quotes. (GET DOWN, MR. President!, BREACH BREACH BREACH, etc.).

name: Blow Your Load
strat: Buy all your abilities and use them at the start of the round. All abilities must be depleted before planting the spike. After the spike is planted, no abilities can be used

name: Tourists
strat: Every teammate must visit each spike site at least once before planting.

name: The Fake-out
strat: Buy all abilities, use all on one site then rush the opposite site.
